testcase.name: TC_02_validate_Watch_Tailer_Button_FrontTopTenVsSliderMovies

failure.message: The following asserts failed: Description is missing for Sholay, ❌ Title mismatch at index 0 | Front: Raat Akeli Hai - The Bansal Murders | Slider: Raat Akeli Hai: The Bansal Murders expected [true] but found [false], Description is missing for Others, ⚠️ Duplicate movie detected: Kantara - A Legend: Chapter 1, ❌ Movie count mismatch (Front vs Slider) expected [10] but found [9], ❌ Title mismatch at index 4 | Front: Kantara A Legend Chapter | Slider: Kantara - A Legend: Chapter 1 expected [true] but found [false], Description is missing for Date with Saie, 'Play Trailer' button not found for: Date with Saie, Movie (Date with Saie) - Play Trailer validation failed, ❌ Title mismatch at index 8 | Front: Bhagwat Chapter One - Raakshas | Slider: Bhagwat Chapter One: Raakshas expected [true] but found [false], Description is missing for Rambo: First Blood, Description is missing for Lee, Description is missing for Rambo: First Blood Part II
